schema.name: AWSConfigInventoryDetailedSchema
schema.description: Detailed schema for AWS Config Resource Inventory with enhanced metadata

columns.name: ResourceType
columns.description: AWS resource type following AWS::Service::ResourceType format

columns.name: ResourceId
columns.description: Unique identifier of the AWS resource (ARN, ID, or name)

columns.name: ResourceName
columns.description: Human-readable name of the AWS resource

columns.name: SourceAccountId
columns.description: 12-digit AWS Account ID where the resource exists
